Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=32 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:20% Cell death=256 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts L929:20% Cell death=64 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:10% Cell death=287 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:50% Cell death=281 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 19660(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida albicans NRRL Y-326(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida albicans NRRL Y-6359(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis NRRL Y-1761(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis NRRL Y-1763(MIC=2µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=7.5-15µM),Candida albicans 17-88(MIC=15µM),Candida glabrata(MIC=>=15µM),Candida tropicalis(MIC=1.9-3.7µM),Candida parapsilosis(MIC=>=15µM),Candida krusei(MIC=7.5-15µM),Candida kefyr(MIC=1.9-3.7µM),Candida lusitaniae(MIC=3.7µM),Candida dubliniensis(MIC=7.5µM),Kluyveromyces lactis(MIC=3.7µM),Debaryomyces hansenii(MIC=7.5µM),Cutibacterium acnes ATCC 6919(MIC=8µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes ATCC 11827(MIC=8µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes(MIC=2-8µg/ml)
